channel.title: [DELTA] Sprites help
channel.description:
Out of place sprites :\ I would be very thankful if someone could help fix this. Please please please help.
I need a old school 317 gameframe. If you have any of these files in a old school gameframe: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vif8nt.png[/img] Please reply to the topic with them, thank you so much. In return I'll increase reputation of your moparscape character.
If you even have a client with those sprite files; I need the sprite folder. Not the whole client. I already installed music onto this client before changing sprites :( Please please please can you send those images in the above image.
Or even if you can help me with coding, like how to change the place of the sprites I'd be so thankful.
Thank you all for reading this.
This is a delta based source/client by the way.
Example of the sprites out of place; [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ayakhw.png[/img]
If you help, I will increase your reputation.. Thanks for reading, please do help me.
EDIT:: NEED HELP PUTTING THEM IN PLACE:
[img]http://s15.postimage.org/9q5ktm4ob/error.png[/img]

item.title: [DELTA] Sprites help
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Nope but how can I edit that? If it enables me to move it, I might aswell edit it to move it right a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Sprites help
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

hmm did u edit the spirits / boarder line to make it out of place?

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Sprites help
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Thanks alot bro, if it works, I’ll rep you.

& Nah I just need the sprites cos I already installed music system on client side aswell :\ but thanks for the offer.

EDIT: Its very confusing :s Could you send me your sprites please.
Thanks so much for you help.

EDIT:
Thanks so much for helping me get sprites.

Please can someone help me put them in place, they’re still out of place;
Here is a picture to show you what I mean: LOOK AT THE SIDEICONS:

error.png764×502

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Sprites help
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

to change spirits already in the cache here is a pi cache editer but this also works for delta as ive been using it for my old school delta project i have a delta client with old gameframe and hit splats if u want it…

here is the cache editor comes with other use full tools:

http://uppit.com/0dp5qcxap8o8/Tools_4u.rar

Read full topic
